top_comment.text:
#NSA Something to really think about - EVERYTHING You Do Online Is Recorded 
In XKeyscore﻿
top_comment.author: Glenn Stewart

comments.text:
Same here. I a lot of pain, but my IBS has been acting up horribly last 4 
days. Crap I want my life back. This Gulf War Illness is no way to live. :-(
comments.author: Glenn Stewart

comments.text:
+Anna J. Sasin Thank you, you are very kind. Any and all help is greatly 
appreciated. The only help I ever see offered is for vets and I am not one.
comments.author: Chris  L

comments.text:
Hey +Henri Broady How the heck are you? Have not seen you around in a while 
my brother. :-)
comments.author: Glenn Stewart

comments.text:
+Chris Lucus Hi, I also have links on my about page that can lead you in 
the right direction for info on PTSD.  :-)
comments.author: Anna J. Sasin

comments.text: +Glenn Stewart well, heck! I'll join that club too!  Lol
comments.author: Anna J. Sasin

comments.text:
+Henri Broady God, I'm so sorry you have to go through all of this; I'm 
sorry any of our warriors do, especially when I find out they [gov't] may 
have been the cause of a lot of the problems coming out of the Gulf Wars.  

Thank you for your service.  Hooah
comments.author: Anna J. Sasin

comments.text:
+Chris Lucus on PTSD I can tell you the VA keeps trying to cram that down 
my throat and hoping I will take it. However I completely rejected that 
option & this is why. The VA for decades has held to the idea that GWS is 
of psychological nature and not a physiological aspect. However last March 
they were finally proven wrong & that there is physical proof that the 
brain structure of vets suffering from GWI have been altered. One thing I 
now tell people going in & currently in service MAKE SURE YOU GET COPIES OF 
ALL PERSONNEL & MEDICAL RECORDS!!! Because without those records, if you 
have a problem later you will go through hell trying to prove your case. I 
was sneaky. Before getting out I made copies of all my medical records 
before getting out & they are all backed up to t a thumb drive & Google 
drive. As for PTSD I am not very knowledgeable in that area & do not want 
to give you false information. However, if you go to the "About" tab on my 
page I have a lot of resource links there. there. 
https://plus.google.com/110321549524619427432/posts
There is also a group on Facebook where several members are well educated 
when it comes to PTSD - https://www.facebook.com/groups/125208941896/
comments.author: Glenn Stewart

comments.text:
Well Worded. Thanks for your service.  My cousin is in Afghanistan right 
now. He is on a MLRS  He has been in for a while and gained rank. Now, 
after all that, as soon as he comes home he is moving and they won't tell 
him where. Some shit huh. I have lots of army buddys that deal with the 
V.A. I don't know any 1st gulf war vets which should have been the only f'n 
war in iraq.  Hey man, I have ptsd. you know much about that?
comments.author: Chris  L

comments.text:
+Chris Lucus I am a retired Gulf War veteran & I can tell you the 
government will NOT be always be truthful. I have been fighting the VA 
since 2010 trying to get help only to be met by a wall of red tape. Why 
because they do not want people to know the truth about the 1st gulf war. 
This is why I do not trust them to do the right thing. I am not opposed to 
them targeting suspicious individuals, but I am against letting them have 
free will to do as they please. I have a Google page & YouTube channel 
dedicated just to expose the truth when it comes to Gulf War Syndrome. I 
like many other Americans have nothing to hide, however just like the 
police cannot come into my home without a warrant which is protected by the 
4th amendment also seek the same protection for my affairs.
comments.author: Glenn Stewart

comments.text:
it's never bothered me that the nsa does  any of that. The people they are 
after are a different breed than us. The reason I came to your page was I 
saw you with your kid and wanted to tell you enjoy them while they are 
little. My girl is 12 and I'm un-cool is that a word?  Those crazies would 
kill our kids as well. The NSA are after very few things and for good 
reasons. let them do it. You have to excuse me cause of the training I had 
and not military. Best wishes  from U.S.A.
comments.author: Chris  L

comments.text:
Exactly +Anna J. Sasin I just feel hell if they are going to be that dang 
nosy, then I might as well walk around in public nude.
comments.author: Glenn Stewart

comments.text:
+Glenn Stewart haha!  I really have nothing to hide, it's the principle I 
guess.
NO! my business is my business, and they're violating our rights. grr
comments.author: Anna J. Sasin

comments.text: LOL Peek a boo #NSA I see you. hahahaha
comments.author: Glenn Stewart

comments.text: hmm....Let's give 'em something to talk about!  haha  kidding
comments.author: Anna J. Sasin
